data.text: @yragail Hi, Yra. We are sorry about this. Your call may not be attended to right away due to high volume of calls being received by our hotline. May we know more details about your concern? Kindly send us a DM, we will try our best to assist you here. Thank you.

@MaramoMark We have sent you a direct message.

@aksd2018 Hello, akm. International transit passengers are not allowed to go out of the terminal if there is no stopover indicated in the ticket. If there is, passengers must comply with arrival protocols in the Philippines.

@GreyGabz You can approach our check-in agent for further assistance, Grey.
@GreyGabz Passengers may need to claim their baggage and clear with Customs upon arrival. However, you may request from our check-in agent to tag your baggage through your final destination. (2/2)
@GreyGabz Hi Grey. For connecting flight involving different terminals (in Manila), due to facility limitation, tagging the baggage all the way to final destination may not be allowed. (1/2)
@cassiebam Our apologies for the inconvenience. We have sent you a DM, Cassie.

@AgnesLianesa Hi Lianesa. We have no advisory regarding this yet. Kindly check our website https://t.co/ePCV23PQfZ, or follow our social media accounts, so that you'll be updated the moment we release advisories on new developments.

urls.title: Musical Instruments
urls.description: Guitars cannot fit in the overhead compartment of the aircraft or under the passenger seats. To ensure accommodation on flight, all guitars shall be accepted only as check-in baggage whether contained in a hard or soft case. Musical instruments shall be free of charge if within the free baggage allowance of the passenger and within 39inches (100cm) in length. Click here for the applicable Free Baggage Allowance and Excess Baggage Charge Otherwise, the musical instrument shall be considered as an additional

data.text: @RoyPasetes @jmbetonio We apologize for the inconvenience, Roy. Please let us know how we can be of assistance. Thank you.

@apple_9198 Hi, apple_9198. Prepaid Baggage can be availed to check-in more than your Free Baggage Allowance indicated in your ticket. You may check this link for more information including applicable service rules: https://t.co/JD7gy4oMAg. Thank you.

urls.title: Prepaid baggage
urls.description: No need to worry about your travel essentials! Save more versus excess fees at the airport. Check-in smoothly at the airport. Rates are per sector and vary per destination. Please refer to the rates and guidelines below. PH – Hong Kong or v.v. USD 45 PH – Port Moresby or v.v. USD 65 PH – Sydney/Melbourne or v.v. USD 95 PH – Tel Aviv or v.v. USD 165 PH – Singapore or v.v. USD 45 PH – Phnom Penh or v.v. USD 45 PH – Hong Kong or v.v. HKD 380 PH – Shanghai or v.v. CNY 320 PH – Denpasar or v.v. IDR 630000 PH
